#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int w1,w2,t,n1,n2,x,ans;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d%d%d",&w1,&w2,&n1,&n2);
		ans=0;
		x=min(w2/2,n2);
		w2-=2*x;
		n2-=x;
		ans+=2*x;
		x=min(w1/2,n2);
		w2-=2*x;
		n2-=x;
		ans+=2*x;
		x=min(w1+w2,n1);
		ans+=x;
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
}
